result.reason: UX enhancement to add a variable picker/helper UI when editing external tool text fields that support variable substitution, reducing documentation dependency.
result.approach: Add a dropdown or context menu button next to variable-supporting text fields listing available variables with current values as hints; reuse existing variable substitution infrastructure
